name: GeoJelly DEMO - ANOTHER RAGE GAME
description:
Born within the unknown you instinctively seek freedom as an experiment defect. In GeoJelly you have to find your way out of a dystopian laboratory through platforming while avoiding traps and collecting the keys necessary to push forward. Are you gonna find a way out

Your wishlist would be very helpful for us! Thanks to You we can create better and better games! It will take you a few sec to add the game to your wishlist <3

Gameplay:
  • Hold to charge, then let go to jump!

- Seems simple? It's only looking simple... hehe

  • Many obstacles await you!

Such as Cannons, Spikes, Jump Pads, Black holes, windmills

More Features:

  • More than 50 Levels (Only in the Full Version) with different themes. 15 Levels in the Demo. Check out Full Version
  • Lots of logical puzzles.
  • Game for many hours.
  • You can become a speedrunner in GeoJelly
  • Great Soundtrack

Full version coming soon to:
Google Play, Steam, AppStore, Nintendo, PS4, PS5, Xbox One
